#solution

select      id
           ,name
           ,unique_id
from        (           select 2,id,parent_id,name,null      from child
            union all   select 1,id,id       ,name,unique_id from parent
            ) t (source_order,id,pid,name,unique_id)
order by    pid
           ,source_order
           ,id;

Select * From
  input1
  Union All
   Select * From
    input2 As t3;
